entry.value: library(Peptides)%%00010df <- knime.in%%00010%%00010# only select AA column%%00010index <- which(colnames(df) == knime.flow.in[["aa_column"]])%%00010AA_list <- as.character(df[,index])%%00010%%00010# create parameters character vector%%00010parameters <- unlist(strsplit(knime.flow.in[["parameters"]], ","))%%00010%%00010# empty output df%%00010output_df <- data.frame(AA_list = AA_list)%%00010colnames(output_df)[1] <- knime.flow.in[["aa_column"]]%%00010%%00010# calculate selected parameters%%00010if("MW" %in% parameters){%%00010%%00009x <- mw(AA_list)%%00010%%00009output_df$MW <- x%%00010}%%00010%%00010if("GRAVY" %in% parameters){%%00010%%00009x <- hydrophobicity(AA_list)%%00010%%00009output_df$GRAVY <- x%%00010}%%00010%%00010if("pI" %in% parameters){%%00010%%00009x <- pI(AA_list)%%00010%%00009output_df$pI <- x%%00010}%%00010%%00010if("AA count" %in% parameters){%%00010%%00009x <- nchar(AA_list)%%00010%%00009output_df$AA.count <- x%%00010}%%00010%%00010rownames(output_df) <- rownames(df)%%00010%%00010knime.out <- output_df

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
